projects.title: A.C.I.S - Automated Component Inspection System
projects.description: AI-powered visual inspection system for automotive assembly lines using YOLOv8 CNNs. Achieves 99.5% mAP@0.5 accuracy with 0.3ms inference time, processing 3-5 images/second. Includes SHAP explainability, Prometheus/Grafana monitoring, and a Streamlit web interface.

projects.title: Multi-Agentic RAG System
projects.description: Advanced multi-agent Retrieval-Augmented Generation system with 9 specialized agents for routing, retrieval, query reformulation, web search, synthesis, fact-checking, and safety checking. Features self-correction, hallucination detection, and an interactive Streamlit chat interface.

projects.title: 2.3M Parameter LLM from Scratch
projects.description: Step-by-step implementation of a 2.3 million parameter language model following the LLaMA 1 architecture. Implements RMSNorm pre-normalization, SwiGLU activation, and Rotary Positional Embeddings (RoPE) from the ground up. Trained on the TinyShakespeare dataset.

projects.title: Financial Advisor LLM
projects.description: Real-time financial advisor chatbot using a 3-pipeline architecture combining LLM deployment, RAG with a Qdrant vector database, and a Bytewax streaming pipeline for live data processing. Implements full LLMOps practices.

projects.title: Predictive Employee Turnover Modeling
projects.description: Logistic regression model trained on 50K+ employee records predicting attrition with 92% accuracy. Achieved 18% F1-score improvement through feature engineering. Integrated fairness-aware evaluation using demographic parity and equalized odds metrics.

projects.title: Generative AI Report Automation
projects.description: Generative AI summarization pipeline condensing 100K+ survey responses with 95% accuracy and hallucination detection. Accelerated data preprocessing and model evaluation pipelines using Python and Pandas, achieving 45% reduction in workflow duration.

projects.title: Real-Time Emotion Detection
projects.description: CNN-based system that detects and classifies 7 human emotions (Angry, Disgusted, Fearful, Happy, Neutral, Sad, Surprised) in real-time from webcam feeds at 20-30 FPS. Trained on the FER2013 dataset with ~3.5M parameters.

projects.title: Diabetic Retinopathy Screening
projects.description: Deep learning system using Convolutional Neural Networks to screen for diabetic retinopathy from retinal fundus images. Applies medical imaging techniques to assist in early detection of vision-threatening conditions.

projects.title: LangChain RAG for Document Understanding
projects.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline for PDF document understanding. Extracts text, chunks documents, creates embeddings with SentenceTransformer, stores in FAISS vector store, and queries using both Hugging Face and OpenAI models.

projects.title: End-to-End MLOps Pipeline
projects.description: Comprehensive MLOps project template covering the full ML lifecycle: data ingestion, model training, validation, deployment, monitoring, and retraining. Includes CI/CD pipelines, model versioning, and infrastructure-as-code.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: Telco customer churn classification using statistical hypothesis testing (chi-square, t-test) and ML models. Analyzes key churn drivers including monthly charges, tenure, and service subscriptions. Full pipeline from MySQL acquisition to model evaluation.

projects.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
projects.description: RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis segmenting customers into 11 groups for an automobile bike company. Includes data quality assessment, exploratory analysis across demographics, and a Tableau sales dashboard.

projects.title: Time Series Forecasting Guide
projects.description: Comprehensive guide covering the full spectrum of time-series analysis: EDA, stationarity testing, classical forecasting (ARIMA, SARIMA, Holt-Winters), deep learning (LSTMs, CNNs), Facebook Prophet, and AutoML with FLAML.

projects.title: Smart City IoT Transit System
projects.description: Optimized IoT data processing using JSON-MQTT protocol with NoSQL database analytics, shrinking model size by 15%. Reduced AI inference cost on edge devices by 30% through model quantization and pruning techniques.

projects.title: DICOM Medical Image Parser
projects.description: High-performance Go library and CLI tool for reading, writing, and processing DICOM medical image files. Supports multi-frame imagery, streaming via Go channels, JSON serialization, and PNG/JPEG extraction.
